from_sub_heading: ¡Convierta su tiempo de inactividad en dinero extra con ExtraBread! No hay necesidad de grandes compromisos - consulte empresas y observe cómo llegan las bonificaciones y los ingresos residuales mensuales. Regístrese con nosotros hoy.
form_title: Comience a obtener ingresos residuales mensuales hoy
form_desc: Complete el formulario y nos comunicaremos con usted en 24-48 horas

programs.title: Flujo de fundos rápidas y sencillo
programs.desc: Gana dinero rápido y fácil a través de nuestro programa de referencias presentando tu favorito establecimientos a ExtraBread. Disfrute de ingresos mensuales residuales para referencias exitosas y tratos cerrados. ¡Únase ahora para convertir su red en una lucrativa fuente de ingresos!

items.title: Bono de firma lucrativo
items.desc: Reciba bonos de hasta $10,000+ para comerciantes que usan ExtraBread

items.title: Oficina Virtual
items.desc: Con nuestra oficina virtual podrá ver sus referencias firmadas, informes diarios y mensuales, bonos y pagos residuales

items.title: Ingreso residual mensual
items.desc: Reciba el ingreso residual mensual más competitivo del mercado para procesamiento de tarjetas de crédito

items.title: Productos competitivos
items.desc: Nuestros productos y servicios competitivos ponen a nuestros agentes en ventaja para construir su portafolio de proyectos

programs.title: Trabajando con los mejores
programs.desc: Nuestro programa de agentes internos es una oportunidad exclusiva para profundizar en nuestras ofertas de servicios. Al inscribirse, obtendrá información valiosa, se convertirá en un miembro integral del equipo y recibirá capacitación experta para sobresalir en su rol. Además de esto, disfrutará de numerosos beneficios, como acceso a instalaciones de oficina dedicadas, soporte administrativo y una variedad de atractivos beneficios. El programa también ofrece un salario base competitivo con potencial para importantes remanentes. y bonificaciones basadas en el desempeño.

items.title: Bono de firma lucrativo
items.desc: Reciba bonos de hasta $10,000+ para comerciantes que usan ExtraBread

items.title: Consultas
items.desc: Con su orientación, podrá ofrecer asistencia a los comerciantes sobre qué sistema POS es lo mejor para su negocio

items.title: Personal experimentado
items.desc: Trabaje junto a un equipo increíble que posee un conocimiento profundo de la industria

items.title: Productos actualizados
items.desc: Trabajar con productos y servicios constantemente actualizados en la industria del punto de venta.

programs.title: Ser tu propio jefe
programs.desc: Join ExtraBread as an independent sales office agent and embrace the freedom of being your own boss. Empower merchants with expert advice on ideal point-of-sale systems, build long-term relationships, and expand your portfolio alongside us.

items.title: Ingreso residual competitivo

items.title: Consultas
items.desc: Con su orientación, podrá ofrecer asistencia a los comerciantes sobre qué es el sistema POS. lo mejor para su negocio

items.title: Personal experimentado
items.desc: Trabaje junto a un equipo increíble que posee un conocimiento profundo de los entresijos. de la industria

items.title: Productos competitivos
items.desc: Nuestros productos y servicios competitivos ponen a nuestros agentes en ventaja para construir su cartera.

referal_program_desc: The referral program is the perfect opportunity to secure extra income during your off-hours. It's straightforward: refer your favorite bars or restaurants, and for each successful referral, you'll receive a consistent monthly income. And if you're seeking stability, we have part-time or full-time positions available.

referal_items.title: Referring a Business
referal_items.desc: Tell us all about your referral(s) and with your introduction, we'll explain our services and what we can offer their business

referal_items.title: Signing Them Up
referal_items.desc: Allow the account manager to successfully sign up and close the deal on your referral

referal_items.title: Earning Residuals
referal_items.desc: As the client continues to happily use ExtraBread's services, you continue to earn monthly residuals

referal_items.title: Expand Your Network
referal_items.desc: Use your successful referrals to grow your network and continue to keep referring businesses

referal_program_desc1: You're in control of your earning potential. Refer as many businesses as you can, and there's no limit to what you can earn. The more referrals you send our way, the more you can earn - it's that simple!

feature_items.title: Lucrative Signing Bonus
feature_items.desc: Receive a signing bonus of up to $10,000+ for merchants who decide to switch over and use ExtraBread's services

feature_items.title: Experienced Staff
feature_items.desc: Work alongside and receive guidance from an amazing crew that possesses an in-depth knowledge of the ins and outs of the industry

feature_items.title: Virtual Office
feature_items.desc: With our virtual office, you'll be able to track and see your signed referrals, daily & monthly reporting, and your bonus and residual payouts

feature_items.title: Monthly Residual Income
feature_items.desc: As your client continues to benefit from ExtraBread's services, you continue to earn a monthly residual income

feature_items.title: Competitive Products/Service
feature_items.desc: We offer a wide range of cutting-edge products and services that put our agents at a great advantage in the industry

feature_items.title: Networking Possibilities
feature_items.desc: By referring business, you have the opportunity to expand your network and establish new connections in the process

pick_extrabread_desc: From consultation to installation, ExtraBread is the one stop shop for all things merchant services for a business! Our unique strength lies in our partnerships with top-tier point-of-sale systems and credit card processing providers. We can offer a business zero processing fees, save their money on POS systems, and even offer large cash signing bonuses. Along with this, we offer 24/7 support - whenever you need us, we’re there.

picking_reason_items.title: For more information to share with clients
With over two decades of industry experience, count on us to stand by you clients every step of the way!
picking_reason_items.text_link: Learn more about what we can offer for yor referral

earning_desc: Turn your downtime into extra cash with ExtraBread! No need for big commitments - refer businesses and watch the bonuses and monthly residual income roll in. Sign up with us today.
start_business_desc: Have some businesses in mind that you want to refer to ExtraBread? Click here to get started and tell us all about it.
